verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me again saying

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּכֶ֗ם אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you מֹֽשְׁלִים֙ <S%H4911><s%> What mean ye that ye use אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> this proverb הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> The fathers יֹ֣אכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> have eaten בֹ֔סֶר <S%H1155><s%> sour grapes וְשִׁנֵּ֥י <S%H8127><s%> teeth הַבָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and the children's תִּקְהֶֽינָה׃ <S%H6949><s%> are set on edge

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> are surely יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֜ם ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore מְשֹׁ֛ל <S%H4911><s%> ye shall not have [occasion] any more to use הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <S%H4912><s%> this proverb הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H5315><s%> Behold all souls לִ֣י הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in כְּנֶ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> are mine as the soul הָאָ֛ב <S%H1><s%> of the father וּכְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> so also the soul הַבֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> of the son לִי־ הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> is mine the soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <S%H2398><s%> that sinneth הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he תָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> it shall die ס

וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> But if a man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> be just וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and right

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not אָכָ֔ל <S%H398><s%> [And] hath not eaten וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> his eyes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or נָשָׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> neither hath lifted up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <S%H1544><s%> to the idols בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> neither hath defiled וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman נִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> to a menstruous לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִקְרָֽב׃ <S%H7126><s%> neither hath come near

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> any לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יוֹנֶ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> And hath not oppressed חֲבֹלָת֥וֹ <S%H2258><s%> his pledge חוֹב֙ <S%H2326><s%> to the debtor יָשִׁ֔יב <S%H7725><s%> [but] hath restored גְּזֵלָ֖ה <S%H1500><s%> none by violence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִגְזֹ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <S%H3899><s%> his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <S%H7457><s%> to the hungry יִתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given וְעֵירֹ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> the naked יְכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> and hath covered בָּֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> with a garment

בַּנֶּ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> upon usury לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> He [that] hath not given forth וְתַרְבִּית֙ <S%H8636><s%> any increase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> neither hath taken מֵעָ֖וֶל <S%H5766><s%> from iniquity יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> [that] hath withdrawn יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> true. יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> hath executed בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> between man לְאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> and man

בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֧י <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes יְהַלֵּ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Hath walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments שָׁמַ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> and hath kept לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to deal אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> truly צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> he [is] just הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he חָיֹ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> live נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> If he beget בֵּן־ <S%H1121><s%> a son פָּרִ֖יץ <S%H6530><s%> [that is] a robber שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> a shedder דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and [that] doeth אָ֔ח <S%H251><s%> the like מֵאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> to [any] one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> of these

וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> And that doeth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for גַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains אָכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> not any of those [duties] but even hath eaten וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour's טִמֵּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> and defiled

עָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> the poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֙ <S%H34><s%> and needy הוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> Hath oppressed גְּזֵל֣וֹת <S%H1500><s%> by violence גָּזָ֔ל <S%H1497><s%> hath spoiled חֲבֹ֖ל <S%H2258><s%> the pledge לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> hath not restored וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגִּלּוּלִים֙ <S%H1544><s%> to the idols נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and hath lifted up עֵינָ֔יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> abomination עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> hath committed

בַּנֶּ֧שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> upon usury נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> Hath given forth וְתַרְבִּ֥ית <S%H8636><s%> increase לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and hath taken וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> shall he then live לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִֽחְיֶ֗ה <S%H2421><s%> ? he shall not live אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתּוֹעֵב֤וֹת <S%H8441><s%> all these abominations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> he hath done מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> he shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> die דָּמָ֖יו <S%H1818><s%> his blood בּ֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> now behold הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> Now lo [if] he beget בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַיַּ֕רְא <S%H7200><s%> that seeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> sins אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> all his father's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> which he hath done וַיִּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> and considereth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and doeth כָּהֵֽן׃ <S%H2004><s%> not such like

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not אָכָ֔ל <S%H398><s%> [That] hath not eaten וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> his eyes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or נָשָׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> neither hath lifted up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <S%H1544><s%> to the idols בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour's לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or טִמֵּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> hath not defiled

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> any לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or הוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> Neither hath oppressed חֲבֹל֙ <S%H2258><s%> the pledge לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or חָבָ֔ל <S%H2254><s%> hath not withholden וּגְזֵלָ֖ה <S%H1500><s%> by violence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or גָזָ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> neither hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <S%H3899><s%> his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <S%H7457><s%> to the hungry נָתָ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> [but] hath given וְעֵר֖וֹם <S%H5903><s%> the naked כִּסָּה־ <S%H3680><s%> and hath covered בָֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> with a garment

מֵעָנִ֞י <S%H6041><s%> from the poor הֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> [That] hath taken off יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand נֶ֤שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> usury וְתַרְבִּית֙ <S%H8636><s%> nor increase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not לָקָ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> [that] hath not received מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> hath executed בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> hath walked ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יָמ֛וּת <S%H4191><s%> he shall not die בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> for the iniquity אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his father חָיֹ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> live

אָבִ֞יו <S%H1><s%> [As for] his father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָ֣שַׁק <S%H6231><s%> oppressed עֹ֗שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> because he cruelly גָּזַל֙ <S%H1497><s%> spoiled גֵּ֣זֶל <S%H1499><s%> by violence אָ֔ח <S%H251><s%> his brother וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that] which [is] not good עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and did בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עַמָּ֑יו <S%H5971><s%> his people וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> lo even he shall die בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> Yet say מַדֻּ֛עַ <S%H4069><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> bear הַבֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> ye Why? doth not the son בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הָאָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> the father's וְהַבֵּ֞ן <S%H1121><s%> the son מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> and right עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> all my statutes שָׁמַ֛ר <S%H8104><s%> [and] hath kept וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and hath done אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> חָיֹ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> them he shall surely יִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> live

הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> The soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <S%H2398><s%> that sinneth הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he תָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> it shall die בֵּ֞ן <S%H1121><s%> The son לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <S%H5375><s%> shall not bear בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הָאָ֗ב <S%H1><s%> of the father וְאָב֙ <S%H1><s%> neither shall the father לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> bear בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הַבֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> of the son צִדְקַ֤ת <S%H6666><s%> the righteousness הַצַּדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְרִשְׁעַ֥ת <S%H7564><s%> shall be upon him and the wickedness [רָשָׁע כ] (הָרָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> wicked ק) עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and תִּֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become ס

וְהָרָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> But if the wicked כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if יָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> will turn מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <S%H2403><s%> sin ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath committed וְשָׁמַר֙ <S%H8104><s%> and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> all my statutes וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> and right חָיֹ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> live לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall not die

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פְּשָׁעָיו֙ <S%H6588><s%> All his transgressions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath committed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִזָּכְר֖וּ <S%H2142><s%> they shall not be mentioned ל֑וֹ בְּצִדְקָת֥וֹ <S%H6666><s%> unto him in his righteousness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> he shall live

הֶחָפֹ֤ץ <S%H2654><s%> Have I any pleasure אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <S%H2654><s%> at all מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> that the wicked נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> declares אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> rather בְּשׁוּב֥וֹ <S%H7725><s%> [and] not that he should return מִדְּרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> from his ways וְחָיָֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> and live ס

וּבְשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> turneth away צַדִּ֤יק <S%H6662><s%> But when the righteous מִצִּדְקָתוֹ֙ <S%H6666><s%> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and committeth עָ֔וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity כְּכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> to all הַתּוֹעֵב֜וֹת <S%H8441><s%> according to all the abominations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> [and] doeth הָרָשָׁ֛ע <S%H7563><s%> that the wicked יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [man] doeth וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> shall he live כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָ֤יו <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <S%H2142><s%> shall not be mentioned בְּמַעֲל֧וֹ <S%H4603><s%> in his trespass אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which מָעַ֛ל <S%H4604><s%> that he hath trespassed וּבְחַטָּאת֥וֹ <S%H2403><s%> and in his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> that he hath sinned בָּ֥ם יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> in them shall he die

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <S%H8505><s%> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> now O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֲדַרְכִּי֙ <S%H1870><s%> Is not my way לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתָּכֵ֔ן <S%H8505><s%> equal הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> ? are not your ways לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתָּכֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H8505><s%> unequal

בְּשׁוּב־ <S%H7725><s%> [man] turneth away צַדִּ֧יק <S%H6662><s%> When a righteous מִצִּדְקָת֛וֹ <S%H6666><s%> from his righteousness וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and committeth עָ֖וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity וּמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> and dieth עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> because בְּעַוְל֥וֹ <S%H5766><s%> in them for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall he die ס

וּבְשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> [man] turneth away רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> Again when the wicked מֵֽרִשְׁעָתוֹ֙ <S%H7564><s%> from his wickedness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath committed וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and doeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> and right ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul יְחַיֶּֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> alive

וַיִּרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> Because he considereth [וַיָּשֹׁוב כ] (וַיָּ֔שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּשָׁעָ֖יו <S%H6588><s%> from all his transgressions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath committed חָי֥וֹ <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> live לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall not die

וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Yet saith בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <S%H8505><s%> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord הַדְּרָכַ֞י <S%H1870><s%> are not my ways לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתָּֽכְנּוּ֙ <S%H8505><s%> equal בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> ? are not your ways לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <S%H8505><s%> unequal

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one כִּדְרָכָ֜יו <S%H1870><s%> according to his ways אֶשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> Therefore I will judge אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> you O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Repent וְהָשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> and turn מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּשְׁעֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> [yourselves] from all your transgressions וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> may not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֛ם לְמִכְשׁ֖וֹל <S%H4383><s%> shall not be your ruin עָוֹֽן׃ <S%H5771><s%> so iniquity

הַשְׁלִ֣יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> Cast away מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּשְׁעֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6588><s%> from you all your transgressions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which פְּשַׁעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6586><s%> whereby ye have transgressed בָּ֔ם וַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and make לָכֶ֛ם לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> you a new וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <S%H2319><s%> and a new וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why תָמֻ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> for why will ye die בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <S%H2654><s%> For I have no pleasure בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> in the death הַמֵּ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> of him that dieth נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהָשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> wherefore turn וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> [yourselves] and live פ
